#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std ;
#define ll long long int
int main()
{
    ll i,j,k,n,m,t ;
    cin >> t ;
    while(t--) {
        cin >> n ;
        ll a[100001] ;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++) cin >> a[i] ;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++) {
            if(a[i] == 1) cout << -1 << " " ;
            else cout << 1 << " " ;
        }
        cout << endl ;
    }
    return 0 ;
}
